feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 08:11 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: WSW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this morning. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
